pullRequest.title: Fix record test
pullRequest.bodyText:
Cannot fix:
DnsZoneRecordSetETagTests.CreateRecordSetsWithDefaultETag: deprecated, need to use private dns
graphrbac.UpdateUser: 403, not very sure the reason, currently there is only MS graph API docs https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-update?view=graph-rest-1.0&tabs=http
GettingSqlServerMetrics: due to azure-core encode bug #11451
still fix:
appservice: hostname binding error and other error
Special Fix:
network watcher: need storage with V2
storage: cannot use import operation with others
sql: cannot create US_WEST sql in microsoft tenant
sql: import need to specify operation import
cosmos: update will not start immediately and some location will be automatically deleted (don't know why)
cosmos: data-plane key could not end with slash

commit.message: fix: sql impl and remove dependency for storage data plane

nodes.bodyText: OK for now. One uncertainty is whether EndpointSuffix will be needed.
Ok, then maybe static is better.

commit.message: feat: make format location as static
